page.title: 07Ghosts in Stoke
page.content: One day the head of the Fluer found out that one of his lower monks was spying for the Abbot of the Priory. So he asked the Abbot of the Priory to come round for a conference. The two began to argue and it got out of hand and soon the Abbot of the Priory stormed out. The Head of the Fluer followed him and ended the fight forever by stabbing him. I think that the ghost of the Priory and Fluer are the ghosts of the two monks,the one from the priory out for revenge and the one from the Fluer is running away. The man living in the Priory has seen the ghost but knows of no connection like the one explained here. So this needs further investigation.
